title: Assignment 1
text: There is a correlation between volume of threatening events and the local weather in terms of temperature and amount of precipitation

title: Assignment 1
text:
How data can be collected

Download data from GDELT based on event code and a selected state for the past 5 years
Download historical weather data reading for the selected state in the past 5 years. Possible source is ncei.noaa.gov/cdo-web/

title: Assignment 1
text:
What methods could be considered?

Scatter plots to check for correlation between independent variables (IV) and dependent variable (DV)
Scatter plots to check for correlation between the IVs
Use R multiple linear regression functions
Use R model validation functions to test model

title: Assignment 1
section: How to start the data project?
text:
How to start the data project?

Define the data sampling parameters, such as number of years to collect events and weather data and for which US state
Go to GDELT and website to to download required data Data collection
Do data cleaning if needed
Join data together based on date and location
Divide data into training data set and testing data set
Use scatter plotting for visual inspection
